verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G1859>feast<s%> of the <S%G3957>passover,<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> that his <S%G5610>hour<s%> was <S%G2064>come<s%> that he should <S%G3327>depart<s%> out of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> to the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> having <S%G25>loved<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> he <S%G25>loved<s%> them to the <S%G5056>end.<s%>

And <S%G1173>supper<s%> being <S%G1096>ended,<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> having <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G906>put<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2588>heart<s%> of <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot,<s%> <S%G4613>Simon's<s%> son, to <S%G3860>betray<s%> him;

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> that the <S%G3962>Father<s%> had <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G5495>hands,<s%> and that he was <S%G1831>come<s%> from <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G5217>went<s%> to <S%G2316>God;<s%>

He <S%G1453>rises<s%> from <S%G1173>supper,<s%> and <S%G5087>laid<s%> <S%G5087>aside<s%> his <S%G2440>garments;<s%> and <S%G2983>took<s%> a <S%G3012>towel,<s%> and <S%G1241>girded<s%> <S%G1438>himself.<s%>

<S%G1534>After<s%> that he <S%G906>pours<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3537>basin,<s%> and <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3538>wash<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples'<s%> <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and to <S%G1591>wipe<s%> them with the <S%G3012>towel<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> he was <S%G1241>girded.<s%>
<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> he to <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter:<s%> and Peter <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> do you <S%G3538>wash<s%> my <S%G4228>feet?<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G3739>What<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> you <S%G1492>know<s%> not <S%G737>now;<s%> but you shall <S%G1097>know<s%> hereafter. <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5028><s%>

<S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, You shall <S%G3364>never<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G3538>wash<s%> my <S%G4228>feet.<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> him, <S%G1437>If<s%> I <S%G3538>wash<s%> you not, you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> me. <S%G1700><s%>
<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> not my <S%G4228>feet<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> my <S%G5495>hands<s%> and my <S%G2776>head.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, He that is <S%G3068>washed<s%> needs <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5532><s%> not <S%G2228>save<s%> to wash <S%G3538><s%> his <S%G4228>feet,<s%> but is <S%G2513>clean<s%> <S%G3650>every<s%> <S%G3650>whit:<s%> and you are <S%G2513>clean,<s%> but not all. <S%G3956><s%>
For he <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> should <S%G3860>betray<s%> him; <S%G1223>therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> he, You are not <S%G3956>all<s%> clean. <S%G2513><s%>

<S%G3767>So<s%> <S%G3753>after<s%> he had <S%G3538>washed<s%> their <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and had <S%G2983>taken<s%> his <S%G2440>garments,<s%> and was <S%G377>set<s%> <S%G377>down<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G1097>Know<s%> you <S%G5101>what<s%> I have <S%G4160>done<s%> to you?
You <S%G5455>call<s%> me <S%G1320>Master<s%> and <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> and you <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G2573>well;<s%> for so I am. <S%G1510><s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> I then, <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> and <S%G1320>Master,<s%> have <S%G3538>washed<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4228>feet;<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> to <S%G3538>wash<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another's<s%> feet. <S%G4228><s%>
For I have <S%G1325>given<s%> you an <S%G5262>example,<s%> that you should <S%G4160>do<s%> as I have <S%G4160>done<s%> to you.

<S%G281>Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, The <S%G1401>servant<s%> is not <S%G3187>greater<s%> than his <S%G2962>lord;<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> he that is <S%G652>sent<s%> <S%G3187>greater<s%> than he that <S%G652>sent<s%> him.
<S%G1487>If<s%> you <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things, <S%G3107>happy<s%> are you <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> them.

I <S%G3004>speak<s%> not of you <S%G3956>all:<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G1586>chosen:<s%> but that the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> may be <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> He that <S%G5176>eats<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> with me has <S%G1869>lifted<s%> up his <S%G4418>heel<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> me.
<S%G737>Now<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you <S%G4253>before<s%> it <S%G1096>come,<s%> that, <S%G3752>when<s%> it is <S%G1096>come<s%> to pass, you may <S%G4100>believe<s%> that I am <S%G1510><s%> he.

<S%G281>Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, He that <S%G2983>receives<s%> whomsoever <S%G1437><s%> <S%G5100><s%> I <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G2983>receives<s%> me; and he that <S%G2983>receives<s%> me <S%G2983>receives<s%> him that <S%G3992>sent<s%> me.

When <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G5023>thus<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> he was <S%G5015>troubled<s%> in <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> and <S%G3140>testified,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G281>Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that <S%G1520>one<s%> of you shall <S%G3860>betray<s%> me.
<S%G3767>Then<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G991>looked<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G639>doubting<s%> of <S%G5101>whom<s%> he <S%G3004>spoke.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> there was <S%G345>leaning<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus'<s%> <S%G2859>bosom<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G25>loved.<s%>
<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3506>beckoned<s%> to him, that he should <S%G4441>ask<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> it should be of <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G3004>spoke.<s%>
He <S%G1161>then<s%> <S%G1968>lying<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus'<s%> <S%G4738>breast<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> is it?

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> He it is, to <S%G3739>whom<s%> I shall <S%G1929>give<s%> a <S%G5596>sop,<s%> when I have dipped <S%G911><s%> it. And <S%G3753>when<s%> he had <S%G1686>dipped<s%> the <S%G5596>sop,<s%> he <S%G1325>gave<s%> it to <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot,<s%> the son of <S%G4613>Simon.<s%>

And <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G5596>sop<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> him. <S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to him, That you <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> quickly. <S%G5032><s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G345>at<s%> the <S%G345>table<s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> for <S%G5101>what<s%> intent he <S%G2036>spoke<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> to him.

For <S%G5100>some<s%> of them <S%G1380>thought,<s%> <S%G1893>because<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G1101>bag,<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G59>Buy<s%> those things that we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of against the <S%G1859>feast;<s%> <S%G2228>or,<s%> that he should <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5100>something<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor.<s%>
He <S%G3767>then<s%> having <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G5596>sop<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> out: and it was <S%G3571>night.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he was <S%G1831>gone<s%> out, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3568>Now<s%> is the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1392>glorified,<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1392>glorified<s%> in him.

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> be <S%G1392>glorified<s%> in him, <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1392>glorify<s%> him in <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and shall <S%G2117>straightway<s%> <S%G1392>glorify<s%> him.

<S%G5040>Little<s%> <S%G5040>children,<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> a <S%G3397>little<s%> while I <S%G1510>am<s%> with you. You shall <S%G2212>seek<s%> me: and as I <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G3699>Where<s%> I <S%G5217>go,<s%> you cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G2064>come;<s%> <S%G2532>so<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you.

A <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> I <S%G1325>give<s%> to you, That you <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another;<s%> as I have <S%G25>loved<s%> you, that you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> another. <S%G240><s%>

By <S%G5129>this<s%> shall all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G1097>know<s%> that you are my <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> to another. <S%G240><s%>

<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> you? <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> him, <S%G3699>Where<s%> I <S%G5217>go,<s%> you <S%G1410>can<s%> not <S%G190>follow<s%> me <S%G3568>now;<s%> but you shall <S%G190>follow<s%> me afterwards. <S%G5305><s%>

<S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1302>why<s%> <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> I <S%G190>follow<s%> you <S%G737>now?<s%> I will <S%G5087>lay<s%> down my <S%G5590>life<s%> for your sake.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> him, Will you <S%G5087>lay<s%> down your <S%G5590>life<s%> for my sake? <S%G281>Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, The <S%G220>cock<s%> shall not <S%G5455>crow,<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> you have <S%G533>denied<s%> me thrice. <S%G5151><s%>
